channel.title: Clever on Silence Speaks
channel.description: Recent content in Clever on Silence Speaks

item.title: In Retrospect
item.author: me@silentsilas.com (Silent Silas)
item.description: Countless information's unaccounted for The second the moment has passed. The details you do retain are blurred And the retention itself won't last. The data chosen to be collected Is picked by your values and beliefs. Who's to know If the changed past guarantees The desired outcome's Probability to increase? (And what of The endless repercussions it's released?) In essence, To put it bluntly, Hindsight Is not 20/20.

item.title: You Are
item.author: me@silentsilas.com (Silent Silas)
item.description: You're the rest of a phrase On the tip of my tongue. You're the forgotten hook To a song I'd once sung. You're the key to a lock Hanging just out of reach. You're the part of the lesson Our professors couldn't teach. You're the tough decision My mind could never make. You're the perfect chord I would find by mistake. You're the trivial problems And their pseudo-solution.
